sentences.en: "I was looking for Sally," he blurted, and his eyes filled with tears.
sentences.cn: 他眼含热泪，突然脱口说道：“我在找莎丽。”

sentences.en: Blurt out English and blurt out the wisdom of life!
sentences.cn: 脱口而出英语,脱口而出生命的智慧!

sentences.en: Blurt out sentences to develop your international muscle.
sentences.cn: 脱口而出句子,打造自己的国际肌肉.

sentences.en: Don't blurt out this piece of news.
I did n't want to blurt out my secret to him.
sentences.cn: 我不想向他突然说出我的秘密.

sentences.en: I will blurt out 1 passage every week. I SWEAR!
sentences.cn: 我每星期要脱口而出1篇短文! 我发誓!

sentences.en: I will blurt out 10 sentences every day.
sentences.cn: 我每天要脱口而出10个句子!

sentences.en: I will blurt out 10 sentences every day. I SWEAR!
sentences.cn: 我每天要脱口而出10个句子! 我发誓!

sentences.en: Oh ! One doesn't blurt these things out to people.
sentences.cn: 噢,这种事情可不能随便跟人说的.

sentences.en: She had no idea what had made her blurt the story out.
sentences.cn: 她不知道自己为什么把故事讲出来.

sentences.en: The amount of sentences blurt out determines your English level.
sentences.cn: 英语水平的不是单词量,而是句子量!

sentences.en: The boss cannot blurt or gossip.
sentences.cn: 老板不能脱口而出或者说三道四.

sentences.en: The standard is skilled to add blurt out.
sentences.cn: 熟练的标准就是要达到不加思索地脱口而出.

sentences.en: You can even blurt out sentences while you a shower!
sentences.cn: 你甚至可以在洗澡的时候脱口而出句子.

sentences.en: You can even blurt out sentences while you take a shower!
sentences.cn: 你甚至可以在洗澡的时候脱口而出句子!

sentences.en: You can't just Blurt it out like that.

words.tran_cn: 未加思索地冲口说出；突然说出

trans.tran_cn: 未加思索地冲口说出；突然说出
trans.tran_en: If someone blurts something, they say it suddenly, after trying hard to keep quiet or to keep it secret

trans.tran_cn: 突然说出，脱口而出，漏出
trans.tran_en: If someone blurts something, they say it suddenly, after trying hard to keep quiet or to keep it secret
